channel.title: [pi] help
channel.description:
I need:
If there are players are fight, if someone trying to drop items and he is under attack, so he can't need to add this sentence if someone drop items under attack:
[b]You must be 10 seconds out of being in combat to drop items.[/b]
[hr]
And if you was fighting someone you must wait 10 secs to open ur bank, need it with this sentence:
[b]You must be 10 seconds out of being to open your bank.[/b]
